description:
At Daniel Law Firm in Memphis, Tennessee, our sole focus is guiding people through personal injury and workers' compensation cases that involve issues such as car accidents, premises liability, medical malpractice and wrongful death. We are a family-owned practice that treats each of our clients as though they were part of our family. Attentive, experienced and compassionate, our attorneys stand by our clients as they face and overcome challenges.

Since we opened our doors in 1968, we have been devoted to holding insurance companies, corporations and individuals accountable for our clients' losses. We have returned millions of dollars to victims of negligence, including the following:

  • A $9 million award following a deadly 18-wheeler accident
  • A $2.5 million verdict for a woman injured due to defective brake repairs
  • $5.6 million in a brain injury case

As a result of these successes and countless others, the attorneys at our law firm have earned membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

We know that suffering a catastrophic injury is overwhelming. Our team works diligently to give people a path to recovery. Along the way, we are responsive to their concerns and honest about what they can expect. To best accommodate our clients, Daniel Law Firm offers free initial consultations.
